intent_atoms.description: Provide a file reader that can read large files in configurable chunks without loading the entire file into memory.
Expose chunk-aligned caching to improve read performance for repeated accesses within the same chunk.
The reader must support a default chunk size of 1 MiB, but allow configuration of different chunk sizes.
Reads spanning multiple chunks must return correct data without errors.
The reader should read sequentially and cross‑chunk spans correctly.

functional_units.name: RandomAccessReader protocol
functional_units.description: Defines an interface for random-access reading of data streams.

functional_units.name: ChunkedFileReader implementation
functional_units.description: Provides buffered file reading with configurable chunk sizes and chunk-aligned caching.

functional_units.name: Configurable chunk size feature
functional_units.description: Allows setting a custom chunk size, defaulting to 1 MiB.

functional_units.name: Chunk-aligned caching mechanism
functional_units.description: Caches data in chunks aligned to the configured chunk boundary for efficient access.

functional_units.name: IO error propagation with context
functional_units.description: Propagates underlying IO errors while adding contextual information.

functional_units.name: XCTest coverage suite
functional_units.description: Automated tests covering sequential reads, cross-chunk spans, arbitrary offset seeks, EOF partial reads, out-of-bounds validation, and injected IO failure scenarios.

functional_units.name: Error taxonomy (ChunkedFileReader.Error)
functional_units.description: Defines specific error types for IO edge cases to guide upstream pipeline handling.
